info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu, MIT
info.abstract: The Output Comparator component can compare up to 4 files of type XML, properties or tab-delimited.
info.description: This component allows you to compare files of XML, properties or tabular format. Output file contains variables lined up next to each other so the values can be compared clearly.

ul.li: Four input files: 2 are required. Allowed format are XML, properties and tabular.
File format: XML, properties file or tabular
Case sensitive: only pertinent for tabular format
Remove empty values: only pertinent for tablular format
File1 column to match: only pertinent for tablular format
File1 column to compare: only pertinent for tablular format
File2 column to match: only pertinent for tablular format
File2 column to compare: only pertinent for tablular format
File3 column to match: only pertinent for tablular format
File3 column to compare: only pertinent for tablular format
File4 column to match: only pertinent for tablular format
File4 column to compare: only pertinent for tablular format
